message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal for both of us. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to counteroffer at $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I need a bit more to make this work. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. It's a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's close this deal.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $10,000 for the product.
